show.subtitle: Connect the Dots promotes health activism, linking personal health to the health of our culture, society, and environment.
show.title: Connect The Dots

title: Digital Disconnect
content:
Robert McChesney on Why the Internet Won’t Solve All Our Problems Alison Rose Levy speaks with media analyst and... <!--more--> historian Robert McChesney, the co-founder of FreePress.
org and the author of the new book, Digital Disconnect:  How Capitalism is Turning the Internet Against Democracy.
@alisonroselevy Sign up for health news and show announcements at www.healthjournalistblog.com
